Q_DESC:
Sherlock is given 22 square tiles, initially both of whose sides have length LL placed in an x?yx?yplane; so that the left bottom of each square coincides with the the origin and their sides are parallel to the axes.

At t=0t=0, both squares start moving along line y=xy=x (along the positive xx and yy) with velocities S1S1 and S2S2.

For each query of form qiqi, Sherlock has to report the time at which the overlapping area of tiles is equal to qiqi.

Note: Assume all values are in standard units.

Input Format 
First line contains integers L,S1,S2L,S1,S2. Next line contains QQ, the number of queries. Each of the next QQ lines consists of one integer qiqi in one line.

Constraints 
1<=L,S1,S2<=1091<=L,S1,S2<=109 
1<=Q<=
